title: To you TSM fans..
body: Congratulations, last night you solidified why I can't stand TSM. As CLG stood there, half of them crying tears of joy, holding their hard-earned trophy that some of them have worked their asses off for YEARS for, you threw all respect out the window and continued to flood out the CLG chants with your dumbass TSM chants. And you wonder why everyone hates your fanbase.

replies.body: I saw the VoD. It is completely disrespectful of the fans to do that to CLG. Regi should seriously release a statement telling his fans to be more humble because I have never seen such awful sportsmanship.

So in other words you were standing up the whole time.

While I don't condone what they were doing, I don't think that it is the right choice to yell "FK TSM" because that does nothing but escalate the situation. The best thing that I think you could have done is just not have participated in it and simply write a comment or a post about is later like you did, minus the derogatory name calling, because again that does nothing but escalate the situation if a TSM fan sees your comment.

I'm glad TSM is going to Worlds, but I honestly believe they will be knocked out early and CLG will be the best performing NA team there

From how TSM have been playing this season they will be lucky to make it out of group stage. Id love to see CLG go far though. Would be amazing if doublelift won worlds. The trash talk would be legendary lol.
Go go, lift-lift!

As a TSM fan I was very happy for CLG and their accomplishment. I almost started tearing up when Hotshot did. 

Not all of us are douchebags. :P

TSM needed to be put into their place. I am not thrilled with the way that the members of the team behave, it is unprofessional and immature at the least. Sure, they are good, but I have never had respect for that team whatsoever. Add that to the constant "TSM BEST TEAM WORLDS" and "THEY ARE THE BEACON OF HOPE FOR NA" and it really gets annoying.

There are a few outstandingly mature players, though, and I really appreciate them. Xpecial immediately comes to mind, as he's always been level headed and professional, and understood that it's a job, not a game.

Thread name: 'To the TSM **fans**'
It's not, people are generally just dumb and get off on being polarized, without realizing how toxic their attitudes also are.

Salty TSM fans huehuehue :D Hate ya boyz!!! 

{{item:3070}} TSM{{item:3070}}

Yeah, I went to the Saturday game. 

A few people would shout things "like Just the TiP" (which is retarded but w,e,) and then a huge crowd would just keep shouting TSM
At least "Just the TiP" has something to do with what's going on. And it's kinda funny. Unlike people chanting TSM after the EU finals.

As a TSM fan I want you guys to know that this unsportsmanlike behavior is so distasteful and makes me feel ashamed to be a TSM fan at times. CLG and its fan's deserved every moment of their victory and for them to be boo'd at and TSM chants thrown at them when they are trying to enjoy this moment makes me want to switch teams in honesty. Apparently honor and grace in defeat is thing in the past for some people and its sad really. Even as a TSM fan I was happy that CLG won they definitely deserved it and worked their asses off. If I could have any team from NA to represent us at worlds it be CLG. The amount of time and effort they took into playing is paying off. Watching Hotshotgg crying on stage over all that hard work paying off made me tear up right in the feels. They deserve winning this split, they deserve to go to worlds, and by god as my witness they deserve to win worlds over all the blood, sweat, and tears they put into making this far and dethroning TSM.
In the most amazing coincidence of the century...many League of Legend spectators are just as unruly and obnoxious as many of League of Legends players.
Wow. I just watched the VoD. That was completely disrespectful and so unprofessional. What pieces of shit. But what else can you expect from TSM fans, right?
Fans aren't professional to be unprofessional. lol.

There's a certain thing that everyone posesses, it's call decency and respect. When you're at an American football game, or a baseball game, or an actual futbol game, do you cheer when someone on the opposing side gets hurt? Or do you blantantly disrepspect someone's emotional celebratory ceremony? Regardless of the case, it's unsportsmanlike, inappropriate and disrespectful. 100% uncalled for. A seriously bogus move.

I don't think there is anything wrong with chanting the name of the losing team in support.  If you like a team, like them all the way.

Cussing at the other team, or their fans is dumb though.

If Riot wants to avoid situations like this it would be best to make different home "Stadiums" persay the same way the NBA does to avoid situations like these.

I wanted to be a fan of tsm cause of their midlane, but I quickly veered away from it when I realized that tsm is full of loud and obnoxious people.

So now I am more of a fan to C9

At least they are consistent.

Edit: Wow a lot of people in this thread seem to be looking for reasons to hate something. They were only about as disrespectful as the "trash talk" that some of the members of CLG was doing. Most of the people who chant TSM probably just do it to be funny and are not actually TSM fans (Whether or not they are fans is beside the point). The TSM chants are done so many times in games where they are not even involved or they are done when something completely unrelated is happening. It is just a joke that most people know is retarded and out of place. Which makes it really funny. If you want genuinely crazy fans, then look no further than the UFC. They boo everything except haymakers and are actually angry about it.

Before you go on about calling me a TSM fan... I was hoping for Gravity to win it this year. I was also happier to see that CLG took it from TSM. I feel like CLG just wanted it more.

TSM fans are obnoxious.  I mean really, 2 minutes into the game when teams were just positioning there were random TSM TSM TSM TSM chants.  I can understand loving a team, but cheer when they actually do something right at least.
Cheer cause you love a team not only when they are winning. That's bandwagoning.

To be fair I'm a TSM fan and I didn't even WATCH the tournament, I just find the players to be fun to watch in solo queue, more so than most pros. So hey, CLG won? Good for them. TSMs in-house fanbase was a bunch of little shits? Good for them, let them be assholes, who cares? People are going to be disrespectful towards people for your entire life, everybody says they want it to change but it never does because the human race as a whole is a bunch of jerks.

As a huge fan of both CLG and TSM, I have to say I was disappointed in the TSM fans at MSG. Is it so hard to be graceful in defeat? CLG, Hotshotgg in particular, have been waiting for this for a long time now.
